cmp: 分 (to divide/minute/(a measure word)/(a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter), part)
mng: to hope for, to long for, to expect

exm.mng: to expect, to look forward to, anxious for sth, to hope (to get sth)
to hope for, to look forward to
hope and expectation, to anticipate, to look forward to, to await expectantly
glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around
to wish for the stars and the moon, to have unreal expectations
exm.pyn: pàn xīng xīng pàn yuè liàng

exm.mng: to look forward eagerly to sth, keenly desired
